@@ -2022,1 +2022,1 @@ -cmd on directories to assign short paths so +cmd on directories to assign arbitrary short paths so @@ -2025,2 +2025,2 @@ -you can reboot Windows in safe mode and run the command on those -directories again.

+in this case, you can reboot Windows in safe mode and run the command on +those directories again.

@@ -2029,1 +2029,5 @@ -rest of the "contains space" warnings from configure can be ignored.

+rest of the "contains space" warnings from configure can be +ignored. You can choose any short name; once it is set, +configure's tools like cygpath can convert the +directory with spaces to your chosen short name and pass it to the build +system.
